a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Borrowing to start or expand business, men vs women, 2017
Percentage of men and women (ages 15+) who report borrowing any money in the past 12 months (by themselves or together with someone
else) to start, operate, or expand a farm or business. Colors represent world regions. Bubble sizes are proportional to the population of the
Data source: World Bank, Gender Statistics (based on multiple sources)
